description: This file contains unit tests for the JSONReader class in the agno document reading module. It tests reading JSON data from files, BytesIO objects, handling errors, chunking functionality, and asynchronous reading.

methods.name: test_read_json_file_path
methods.description: Tests reading a JSON file from a temporary path and verifying content.

methods.name: test_read_json_bytesio
methods.description: Tests reading JSON data from a BytesIO object.

methods.name: test_read_json_list
methods.description: Tests reading a JSON list containing multiple objects.

methods.name: test_chunking
methods.description: Tests the chunking functionality of the JSONReader.

methods.name: test_file_not_found
methods.description: Ensures FileNotFoundError is raised for nonexistent files.

methods.name: test_invalid_json
methods.description: Checks handling of invalid JSON data.

methods.name: test_unsupported_file_type
methods.description: Checks that unsupported file types raise a ValueError.

methods.name: test_empty_json_file
methods.description: Tests handling of an empty JSON file.

methods.name: test_empty_json_array
methods.description: Tests handling of an empty JSON array.

methods.name: test_unicode_content
methods.description: Tests reading JSON with Unicode content.

methods.name: test_nested_json
methods.description: Tests reading deeply nested JSON data.

methods.name: test_large_json
methods.description: Tests handling of large JSON data.

methods.name: test_async_read_json_file_path
methods.description: Asynchronous test for reading JSON from a file path.

methods.name: test_async_read_json_bytesio
methods.description: Asynchronous test for reading JSON from BytesIO.

methods.name: test_async_read_json_list
methods.description: Asynchronous test for reading a list of JSON objects.

methods.name: test_async_chunking
methods.description: Asynchronous test for chunking functionality.

methods.name: test_async_file_not_found
methods.description: Asynchronous test for handling nonexistent files.

methods.name: test_async_invalid_json
methods.description: Asynchronous test for invalid JSON data.

methods.name: test_async_unsupported_file_type
methods.description: Asynchronous test for unsupported file types.

methods.name: test_async_unicode_content
methods.description: Asynchronous test for Unicode JSON content.

methods.name: test_async_large_json
methods.description: Asynchronous test for large JSON data.
